title: BRIEF-Oilex Entered Into Variation Agreements With Holloman Energy, Perseville Investing, Terra Nova Energy
text:
BRIEF-Oilex Entered Into Variation Agreements With Holloman Energy, Perseville Investing, Terra Nova Energy

Stock Markets 26 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 17:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oilex Entered Into Variation Agreements With Holloman Energy, Perseville Investing, Terra Nova Energy Sept 18 (Reuters) - Oilex Ltd : * HAS ENTERED INTO VARIATION AGREEMENTS WITH HOLLOMAN ENERGY CORPORATION, PERSEVILLE INVESTING INC AND TERRA NOVA ENERGY (AUSTRALIA) PTY * AGREEMENT TO AMEND END DATE FOR SETTLEMENT TO 14 OCTOBER 2019 * AMENDMENT IS AT COMPANY'S REQUEST IN ORDER TO EFFECTIVELY MANAGE VARIOUS ACQUISITIONS IN AUSTRALIA AND U.K.

BRIEF-Oilex Entered Into Variation Agreements With Holloman Energy, Perseville Investing, Terra Nova Energy
description: BRIEF-Oilex Entered Into Variation Agreements With Holloman Energy, Perseville Investing, Terra Nova Energy
